hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: Full-stack developer exploring AI, machine learning, and cybersecurity to build smarter and more resilient digital products.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Based in Djibouti, I'm Mohamed Ali Youssouf, commonly known as Mohamed Chakkir. I earned my Computer Science degree in 2025, and my passion for web development began long before that, growing from early explorations in high school into a focus on modern full-stack development with React/Next.js and Express.js or Laravel.
about.paragraph2: I'm currently expanding into AI, machine learning, and cybersecurity as I prepare for postgraduate studies, and I bring strong multilingual communication skills in French, English, Arabic, and Somali as my native language.

certicarte.title: CertiCarte
certicarte.description: A Certification Management System that facilitates and automates the generation of student ID cards, student certificates, and class attendance lists.

nassibpay.title: NassibPay
nassibpay.description: A Dues Management System that streamlines member management, payment tracking, financial reporting, and administrative oversight through an intuitive web interface.

laragigs.title: LaraGigs
laragigs.description: A Job Listing Platform that connects talent with opportunities through an intuitive interface, offering advanced search, and seamless communication.

contact.title: Let's stay in touch!
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
